definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: 37 heavy rain, no rain, next year.
Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作为创作型歌手的凯利将在明年二月发行新唱片。

sentences.english: He decided to grow cotton in his field next year.
sentences.chinese: 他打算明年在自己的地亩上种棉花。

sentences.english: Next year has been designated as the Year of China-Pakistan Friendship. A number of exchange activities will be held.
sentences.chinese: 明年是“中巴友好年”，双方将举办一系列交流活动。

sentences.english: It seemed obvious that China was rehearsing for next year.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，中国似乎是在为明年的奥运会进行彩排。

sentences.english: The Dramatic Society are doing 'Hamlet next year.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧社准备明年演出《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.english: I was going to marry with the man traveler.
sentences.chinese: 我和公驴打算明年结婚。

sentences.english: And that we should not worry about the deficit next year or even the year after.
sentences.chinese: 而且我们不应该担心明年或是后年的财政赤字。

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上将出现浮动酒店。

sentences.english: The fear is that the next election, due next year, will follow the same course.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕明年的下一轮选举也难逃相同的厄运。

sentences.english: But next year, tax rises will make up nearly half of it.
sentences.chinese: 但明年，税收的增长将会弥补一半缩减的开支。

sentences.english: When completed , the museum will be open to the public next year.
sentences.chinese: 完工后，博物馆将在明年向公众开放。

sentences.english: 'We want to try for the title next year,' Mancini said.
sentences.chinese: “我们要为冠军而努力，明年”曼奇尼说。

sentences.english: The full cast will be announced next year and filming will begin in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 全体演职员表将于明年公布，并在春天开拍。

sentences.english: There also are plans to flight-test the scale model next year.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些计划试飞规模示范明年。

sentences.english: One is the reason why trade slumped so badly at the turn of the year.
sentences.chinese: 一是就是贸易为何在今年底或明年初如此严重地下滑。

definition: when the time comes/at the scheduled time
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
three years from now/year after year after next year
